entry.source: I went ahead and made the task at hand into a quest.{F801}You have an appointment on the {F804,5}Mikado Castle rooftop{F804,0}{F801}with Master {F804,5}Jonathan{F804,0} and Master {F804,5}Walter.{F804,0}{F801} {F801}All you need to do is {F804,5}go to where you planned to{F801}meet{F804,0} and speak with Master Jonathan.{F801}
entry.target: Eu me adiantei e fiz da tarefa atual uma missao.{F801}Voce tem um compromisso na {F804,5}cobertura do Castelo Mikado{F804,0}{F801}com o Mestre {F804,5}Jonathan{F804,0} e Mestre {F804,5}Walter.{F804,0}{F801} {F801}Tudo o que voce precisa fazer eh {F804,5}ir{F801}para onde voces planejaram se encontrar{F804,0} e falar com o Mestre Jonathan.{F801}
